title: A future without doctors?
description: We discuss if AI could replace human doctors and nurses

vocabItems.definition: the kind and caring behaviour shown by doctors and nurses to people who are ill
small brown or ginger spot on someone’s skin, especially a person with pale skin
a doctor’s judgement about what someone’s particular sickness or disease is, made after examining them
a useful and practical but approximate way of doing or measuring something

vocabItems.word: where, how, what, why on earth
vocabItems.definition: ...?an emphatic way of forming a statement or question to show frustration, anger, surprise or disbelief
